name: Krasue
description: The Krasue (กระสือ in Thai, also Krahang, Kasu, or Ap) represents one of the most terrifying and viscerally disturbing entities in Southeast Asian supernatural tradition—a vampiric spirit manifesting as a beautiful woman by day whose head detaches at night, trailing luminous entrails as it floats through darkness seeking blood, raw flesh, and human waste to consume.
